duties_responsibilities.duty: Define and implement company-wide cloud strategy and provide an internal developer platform.
Facilitate org-level processes, program reviews, and retrospectives for visibility, risk assessment, and feedback.
Drive adoption of consistent project management processes for individual teams.
Forecast program risks and analyze/mitigate plans proactively.
Help define, track, and review key metrics related to organizational health and project delivery.
Manage communication and build strong relationships with engineering, product, finance, and more.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (Master’s preferred)
